__e: If you Feds are so hot for this guy, why don't you just let us go out? We'll bring him in, that's it.
Can't we release him today and pick up the pieces tomorrow? We caught him before, we'll catch him again.
You must know we are doing everything we can to apprehend him.
Arthur, I'm sorry to have to tell you that I'm here to arrest you for the murder of your wife.
I'm not here to arrest you. I'm here to make a deal.
I am the police. And I'm here to arrest you.
If we're able to apprehend alive, we may get...
I would ask myself, if there was someone that I knew that had committed a crime would I have the fortitude to put them away?
I'm here to arrest you for the murder of your husband. Yes. Yes, yes.
You didn't want to help me, you just wanted to arrest me for something I didn't do.
If you're going to be arresting me every time someone shows up dead... -...we might as well get to know each other. - I already know...
It's your duty to bring me in but I know who you are and I know what you've done.
And now they have a good reason to come for her.
Either I could tell you it was her...
They knew that she was not a whore and that she would fight back, and now they have a good reason to come for her.
